attributes.action: ensure that no bonuses are paid to bankers until the National Debt has been paid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As bankers were the main people to cause the recession it is scandalous that they should receive bonuses when the country is still trying to recover.  Any bonuses should be put towards the national debt and only when it is paid should they be allowed to have a reduced amount.  The ordinary people of the country are bearing the brunt of the recession so it is only right that those who caused it be made to pay.  Perhaps that will ensure their are more careful in the future!
